### Utility Functions

stream()[source]

Stream one line at a time from stdin, process it, and yield StreamValue objects.

read_stream()[source]

Read all lines from stdin, process them, and return a list of StreamValue objects. Skip if stream is empty.

yield_scope(stream_value)[source]

Create a scope dictionary for evaluating expressions.

create_global_scope()[source]

Create a global scope with utility functions.
